00003 /**
00004  * @brief Dialog messagebox class.

00011  * @version     1.0.0
00012  * 
00013  * @todo        Rewrite with Smarty.
00014  */
00015 
00016 class Boo_Dialog_MessageBox extends Boo_Dialog {
00017     public $list;
00018     public $icon;
00019     
00020     public function __construct() {
00021         parent::__construct();
00022         $this->list = new Boo_Html_Ol;
00023         $this->addClass('dialog');
00024         $this->addClass('messagebox');
00025         
00026         $this->icon = new Boo_Html_Img;
00027         $this->icon->setAttr('src', BOO_IMAGE_DIR_HTML . '/icons/messagebox.png');
00028         $this->icon->setAttr('alt', 'Powered by Boo');
00029         $this->icon->addClass('icon');
00030     }
00031     
00032     public function addMessage($message, array $attrs = array()) {
00033         $message = trim($message);
00034         $li = new Boo_Html_Li;
00035         $li->applyAttrs($attrs);
00036         $li->setContent($message);
00037         return $this->list->addLi($li);
00038         
00039         
00040     }
00041     
00042     public function getMessages() {
00043         $messages = array();
00044         foreach ($this->list->getLis() as $key => $value) {
00045             $messages[] = $value->getContent();
00046         }
00047         
00048         return $messages;
00049     }
00050     
00051     /**
00052      * @brief Merges list items from another list into this list.
00053      * @return int Returns number of items merged.
00054      * @param Boo_Html_List $list The list object to merge.
00055      */
00056     public function merge(Boo_Html_List $list) {
00057         return $this->list->merge($list);
00058     }
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * @brief Sets the icon for the message box.
00062      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise
00063      * @param mixed $icon Accepts either a Boo_Html_Img object or a string to use as the image source.
00064      */
00065     public function setIcon($icon) {
00066         if ($icon instanceof Boo_Html_Img) {
00067             $this->icon = $icon;
00068             return true;
00069         } elseif (is_string($icon)) {
00070             return $this->icon->setAttr('src', $icon);
00071         } else {
00072             trigger_error("Icon $icon is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00073             return false;
00074         }
00075         
00076     }
00077     
00078     // FIX
00079     public function saveSession() {
00080     //$_SESSION['boo_messagebox'][$this->getAttr('id')] = $this->ol;
00081     
00082         $_SESSION['booMessageBox'][$this->getAttr('id')] = serialize($this->list);
00083     //  var_dump($_SESSION);
00084         return true;    
00085     
00086     }
00087     
00088     public function openSession() {
00089     //  echo "open";
00090     //  var_dump($_SESSION);
00091         
00092         if (isset($_SESSION['booMessageBox'][$this->getAttr('id')])) {
00093             $ol = unserialize($_SESSION['booMessageBox'][$this->getAttr('id')]);
00094         //  var_dump($ol);
00095             $this->list = $ol;
00096         //  echo "yippie";
00097             return true;
00098         } else {
00099             //echo "fail";
00100             return false;
00101         }
00102     }
00103     
00104     public function clearSession() {
00105         unset($_SESSION['booMessageBox'][$this->getAttr('id')]);
00106         return true;
00107         
00108     }
00109     
00110     function getMessageCount() { return $this->list->getCount(); }
00111     
00112     public function html() {
00113         
00114         $this->clearSession(); // clears session because it is displayed
00115         if ($this->list->isEmpty()) {
00116             // no messages, make invisible
00117             $this->setAttr('style', 'display: none;');
00118         }
00119         
00120         $tmp = parent::htmlOpen()
00121             . '<div class="messagebox-icon clearfix">' . $this->icon .'</div>'
00122             . '<div class="messagebox-list clearfix">'. $this->list . '</div>'
00123             . '<div class="messagebox-close clearfix"><a class="button button-close" href="#">Close</a></div>'
00124             . parent::htmlClose();
00125         
00126         return $tmp;
00127     }
00128 }
